The claim originated from Hal Turner: a white supremacist radio personality and blogger, suggesting a potential bias or motive behind the dissemination of the information.
The video presented as: proof" in support of the claim shows individuals wearing green fatigues casually walking in loose formation, but there is no evidence to confirm that they are Chinese military troops as claimed.
